task.title: Receiving files using Bluetooth®
task.shortdesc: When a file is sent to your phone using Bluetooth® technology, a dialog box appears on your phone screen.

context.p: To perform this task, the Bluetooth® must be turned on. See

step.cmd: In the dialog box that appears on your device, asking if you accept the transfer click Yes.
Choose a location where to save the file.
When the file is transferred, a notification message is displayed.
